title: does riot pair you with worse teamates when u are on winning strike?
body:
basically i was winning 8games in a row. then i start losing 3 games in a row(https://imgur.com/a/45yCzV8). and some may say it is just unlucky. but i would like to start a discussion with an argument saying that riot is responsible for shitty unbalanced team matching. 

1. all my teamates win rate (avreage 30%) is already much lower than enemy team(45%) the stats is obtained from pre game analysis from https://app.mobalytics.gg/
2. even before i start losing, i already realized the server is pairing me with shitty teamates although i won those games. https://imgur.com/a/SB0ZqvS
a lucian 0/18

does riot pair you with worse and worse teamates when u are on winning strike?

also why does it allow teamates with lower win rate group into one team? does that make the game balance terrible? so games just determined to be lost.

replies.body: your scores are hardly any good anyway? maybe your the bad one

Its how they keep players coming back for more games and grinding.

In fact the whole philosophy of Riot Games is to make bank by taking advantage of adolescents.
